trans-unit.source: Represents the document type declaration.
trans-unit.target: 表示文档类型声明。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType> class can be used to return information about a document type declaration.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType>类可以用于返回有关文档类型声明的信息。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateDocumentType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateDocumentType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来创建<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType>对象。

trans-unit.source: The qualified name; see the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType.Name" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 限定名称，请参见 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType.Name" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The public identifier; see the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType.PublicId" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 公共标识符，请参见 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType.PublicId" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The system identifier; see the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType.SystemId" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 系统标识符，请参见 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType.SystemId" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The DTD internal subset; see the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType.InternalSubset" /> property.
trans-unit.target: DTD 内部子集，请参见 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType.InternalSubset" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The parent document.
trans-unit.target: 父文档。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Do not instantiate an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType> directly; instead, use members such as <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.DocumentType%2A> to obtain one.
trans-unit.target: 不要实例化<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType>直接; 相反，使用成员，如<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.DocumentType%2A>获取一个。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to recursively clone the subtree under the specified node; <see langword="false" /> to clone only the node itself.
trans-unit.target: 若要递归地克隆指定节点下的子树，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅克隆节点本身，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For document type nodes, the cloned node always includes the subtree, regardless of the parameter setting.
trans-unit.target: 对于文档类型节点，不管参数设置如何，克隆的节点总是包括子树。

trans-unit.source: Creates a duplicate of this node.
trans-unit.target: 创建此节点的副本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned node.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的节点。

trans-unit.source: This method serves as a copy constructor for nodes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可作为节点的复制构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The cloned node has no parent (<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode%2A> returns `null`).
trans-unit.target: 克隆的节点具有没有父级 (<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode%2A>返回`null`)。

trans-unit.source: To see how this method behaves with other node types, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.CloneNode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看此方法与其他节点类型的行为方式，请参阅<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.CloneNode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlEntity" /> nodes declared in the document type declaration.
trans-unit.target: 获取文档类型声明中声明的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlEntity" /> 节点的集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNamedNodeMap" /> containing the <see langword="XmlEntity" /> nodes.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see langword="XmlEntity" /> 节点的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNamedNodeMap" />。

trans-unit.source: The returned <see langword="XmlNamedNodeMap" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 返回的 <see langword="XmlNamedNodeMap" /> 是只读的。

trans-unit.source: The order in which the entities are returned is not based on the order in which these items may appear in the document.
trans-unit.target: 在其中返回的实体的顺序不基于这些项在文档中可能出现的顺序。

trans-unit.source: The order is also not guaranteed to be the same between similar documents, or between different implementations or versions of the class.
trans-unit.target: 顺序也并非一定要相同相似的文档之间或不同的实现或类的版本之间。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays information about the entities declared in the XML document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示 XML 文档中声明的实体的信息。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the file `doment.xml` as input.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用文件`doment.xml`作为输入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the document type definition (DTD) internal subset on the DOCTYPE declaration.
trans-unit.target: 获取 DOCTYPE 声明上文档类型定义 (DTD) 内部子集的值。

trans-unit.source: The DTD internal subset on the DOCTYPE.
trans-unit.target: DOCTYPE 上的 DTD 内部子集。

trans-unit.source: If there is no DTD internal subset, String.Empty is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有 DTD 内部子集，则返回 String.Empty。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays information about the DocumentType node.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示有关 DocumentType 节点的信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the node is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取指示节点是否只读的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the node is read-only; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果节点是只读的，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Because DocumentType nodes are read-only, this property always returns <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 由于 DocumentType 节点是只读的，所以此属性总是返回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: A read-only node is one whose properties, attributes, or children cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: 只读节点是一个无法更改其属性、 属性或子级。

trans-unit.source: However, you can remove a read-only node from the tree and insert it somewhere else.
trans-unit.target: 但是，你可以从树中删除只读节点，并将它的其他位置。

trans-unit.source: You can remove a `XmlDocumentType` from a document and reinsert it back into the document as long as the document does not have an element node.
trans-unit.target: 你可以删除`XmlDocumentType`从文档并将其重新插入文档，只要文档没有元素节点。

trans-unit.source: Once a document has a root element, its `XmlDocumentType` cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: 一旦文档有一个根元素，其`XmlDocumentType`不能更改。

trans-unit.source: This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 此属性是文档对象模型 (DOM) 的 Microsoft 扩展。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays information about the DocumentType node.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示有关 DocumentType 节点的信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets the local name of the node.
trans-unit.target: 获取节点的本地名称。

trans-unit.source: For DocumentType nodes, this property returns the name of the document type.
trans-unit.target: 对于 DocumentType 节点，此属性返回文档类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the qualified name of the node.
trans-unit.target: 获取节点的限定名称。

trans-unit.source: For DocumentType nodes, this property returns the name of the document type.
trans-unit.target: 对于 DocumentType 节点，此属性返回文档类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays information about the DocumentType node.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示有关 DocumentType 节点的信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: For DocumentType nodes, this value is XmlNodeType.DocumentType.
trans-unit.target: 对于 DocumentType 节点，该值是 XmlNodeType.DocumentType。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNotation" /> nodes present in the document type declaration.
trans-unit.target: 获取文档类型声明中存在的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNotation" /> 节点的集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNamedNodeMap" /> containing the <see langword="XmlNotation" /> nodes.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see langword="XmlNotation" /> 节点的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNamedNodeMap" />。

trans-unit.source: The returned <see langword="XmlNamedNodeMap" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 返回的 <see langword="XmlNamedNodeMap" /> 是只读的。

trans-unit.source: The order in which the notations are returned is not based on the order in which these items may appear in the document.
trans-unit.target: 表示法的返回顺序不基于这些项在文档中可能出现的顺序。

trans-unit.source: The order is also not guaranteed to be the same between similar documents, or between different implementations or versions of the class.
trans-unit.target: 顺序也并非一定要相同相似的文档之间或不同的实现或类的版本之间。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays information about the notations declared in the XML document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示在 XML 文档中声明的符号信息。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the file `doment.xml` as input.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用文件`doment.xml`作为输入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the public identifier on the DOCTYPE declaration.
trans-unit.target: 获取 DOCTYPE 声明上公共标识符的值。

trans-unit.source: The public identifier on the DOCTYPE.
trans-unit.target: DOCTYPE 上的公共标识符。

trans-unit.source: If there is no public identifier, <see langword="null" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有公共标识符，则返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the system identifier on the DOCTYPE declaration.
trans-unit.target: 获取 DOCTYPE 声明上系统标识符的值。

trans-unit.source: The system identifier on the DOCTYPE.
trans-unit.target: DOCTYPE 上的系统标识符。

trans-unit.source: If there is no system identifier, <see langword="null" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有系统标识符，则返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlWriter" /> to which you want to save.
trans-unit.target: 要保存到其中的 <see langword="XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Saves all the children of the node to the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 将该节点的所有子项保存到指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 中。

trans-unit.source: For <see langword="XmlDocumentType" /> nodes, this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <see langword="XmlDocumentType" /> 节点，此方法无效。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlWriter" /> to which you want to save.
trans-unit.target: 要保存到其中的 <see langword="XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Saves the node to the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 将节点保存到指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。
